vote.text: Amendment SA 4162 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4162 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Cassidy. (consideration: CR S7822; text: CR S7822) To modify the bill.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4162 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
